6.79: False Promise Reduced cast range from 1500 to 1000. Increased manacost from 100 to 200.
6.84: Fortune's End no longer ignores ancient creeps, Roshan and creep-heroes.  Purifying Flames Reduced manacost from 55/70/85/100 to 50/60/70/80. Reduced cooldown from 3 to 2.5. Can now target non-hero units.  False Promise No longer makes the target invisible. Now continuously removes debuffs and disables, instead of only when first cast. Reduced duration from 7/8/9 to 6/7/8. Increased cooldown from 20 to 80/60/40.
6.79c: Increased  Purifying Flames manacost from 30/45/60/75 to 55/70/85/100.
